content: I am a PhD candidate at the National Institute for Basic Biology, Japan. I am studying coral bleaching through physiological and genomic approaches. I am interested in machine learning techniques to use in biological studies.
summary: I am a PhD candidate at the National Institute for Basic Biology, Japan. I am studying coral bleaching through physiological and genomic approaches. I am interested in machine learning techniques to use in biological studies.
title: Mariko Kishimoto

content:
Hello Everyone,
This is Mariko from Japan, and welcome You to my very new website which I created with Blogdown.
I will post how I learn statistics and genomics using R and other tools. I will also post my participations in TidyTuesday!
iris %>% ggplot(aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) + geom_point() + theme_minimal() + scale_colour_ghibli_d("LaputaMedium", direction = -1)
title: Hello World!
